page.title: 06LAW AND ORDER - CHIGNALS.
page.content:
The Policeman for this area is stationed in the village of Roxwell. Much of his work involves visiting the areas of Roxwell, Mashbury and Good Easter by car. There is little crime in the area due to its small population.He acts more as a public relations officer than an actual crime prevention.The majority of his work is concerned with the needs of the elderly and solving domestic quarreling.The only crime reported in the first six months of 1985 was the theft of a small amount of money.
.......**********************.......
